item.title: Redshift Serverless and other serverless aggregation services, run query with Glue Data Catalog
item.description: Redshift Serverless Redshift Serverless is a new feature which can use Redshift, a petabyte-scale DWH without the instance, announced at this year’s re:Invent. It is available existing features such as Redshift Spectrum, refer to S3 directly, Federated Query to RDS, and Redshift ML. I’m happy with this update as it is costly to keep the instance running for occasional usage such as analytics. The cost is charged for at least 1 minute RPU time and storage.
